entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dawson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dawson Creek Airport 08:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -19.1°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Occasional drifting snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Drifting snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 6 except minus 3 near Chetwynd.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. High minus 6 except minus 3 near Chetwynd. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
